title: Thermal Expansion 3
description:
After the release of Thermal Expansion 3, I did some checking around to an issue i was having with one of their machines not accepting items.

When I installed GregTech, the Magmatic Crucible stopped accepting most of its items. I contacted them on this and it's not something on their end since it works with all other mods except this one.

Any ideas on how to fix it or do you need more info? (TE3.0.0b2 and GT 4.04z)

replies.body: The mod devs are working on it.  I expect 3.0.0b3 will be the fix.
b3 has been released, and I saw someone say it was fixed.
